  • Leviticus 27
1 And the Domina spoke unto Moses, after the death of the two daughters of Aaron, when they drew near before the Domina, and died; 2 and the Domina said unto Moses: 'Speak unto Aaron thy sister, that she come not at all times into the holy place within the veil, before the ark-cover which is upon the ark; that she die not; for I appear in the cloud upon the ark-cover. 3 Herewith shall Aaron come into the holy place: with a young bullock for a sin-offering, and a ram for a burnt-offering. 4 She shall put on the holy linen tunic, and she shall have the linen breeches upon her flesh, and shall be girded with the linen girdle, and with the linen mitre shall she be attired; they are the holy garments; and she shall bathe her flesh in water, and put them on. 5 And she shall take of the congregation of the children of Israel two he-goats for a sin-offering, and one ram for a burnt-offering. 6 And Aaron shall present the bullock of the sin-offering, which is for herself, and make atonement for herself, and for her house. 7 And she shall take the two goats, and set them before the Domina at the door of the tent of meeting. 8 And Aaron shall cast lots upon the two goats: one lot for the Domina, and the other lot for Azazel. 9 And Aaron shall present the goat upon which the lot fell for the Domina, and offer her for a sin-offering. 10 But the goat, on which the lot fell for Azazel, shall be set alive before the Domina, to make atonement over her, to send her away for Azazel into the wilderness. 11 And Aaron shall present the bullock of the sin-offering, which is for herself, and shall make atonement for herself, and for her house, and shall kill the bullock of the sin-offering which is for herself. 12 And she shall take a censer full of coals of fire from off the altar before the Domina, and her hands full of sweet incense beaten small, and bring it within the veil. 13 And she shall put the incense upon the fire before the Domina, that the cloud of the incense may cover the ark-cover that is upon the testimony, that she die not. 14 And she shall take of the blood of the bullock, and sprinkle it with her finger upon the ark-cover on the east; and before the ark-cover shall she sprinkle of the blood with her finger seven times. 15 Then shall she kill the goat of the sin-offering, that is for the people, and bring her blood within the veil, and do with her blood as she did with the blood of the bullock, and sprinkle it upon the ark-cover, and before the ark-cover. 16 And she shall make atonement for the holy place, because of the uncleannesses of the children of Israel, and because of their transgressions, even all their sins; and so shall she do for the tent of meeting, that dwelleth with them in the midst of their uncleannesses. 17 And there shall be no woman in the tent of meeting when she goeth in to make atonement in the holy place, until she come out, and have made atonement for herself, and for her household, and for all the assembly of Israel.
18 And she shall go out unto the altar that is before the Domina, and make atonement for it; and shall take of the blood of the bullock, and of the blood of the goat, and put it upon the horns of the altar round about. 19 And she shall sprinkle of the blood upon it with her finger seven times, and cleanse it, and hallow it from the uncleannesses of the children of Israel. 20 And when she hath made an end of atoning for the holy place, and the tent of meeting, and the altar, she shall present the live goat. 21 And Aaron shall lay both her hands upon the head of the live goat, and confess over her all the iniquities of the children of Israel, and all their transgressions, even all their sins; and she shall put them upon the head of the goat, and shall send her away by the hand of an appointed woman into the wilderness. 22 And the goat shall bear upon her all their iniquities unto a land which is cut off; and she shall let go the goat in the wilderness. 23 And Aaron shall come into the tent of meeting, and shall put off the linen garments, which she put on when she went into the holy place, and shall leave them there. 24 And she shall bathe her flesh in water in a holy place and put on her other vestments, and come forth, and offer her burnt-offering and the burnt-offering of the people, and make atonement for herself and for the people. 25 And the fat of the sin-offering shall she make smoke upon the altar. 26 And she that letteth go the goat for Azazel shall wash her clothes, and bathe her flesh in water, and afterward she may come into the camp. 27 And the bullock of the sin-offering, and the goat of the sin-offering, whose blood was brought in to make atonement in the holy place, shall be carried forth without the camp; and they shall burn in the fire their skins, and their flesh, and their dung. 28 And she that burneth them shall wash her clothes, and bathe her flesh in water, and afterward she may come into the camp. 29 And it shall be a statute for ever unto you: in the seventh month, on the tenth day of the month, ye shall afflict your souls, and shall do no manner of work, the home-born, or the stranger that sojourneth among you. 30 For on this day shall atonement be made for you, to cleanse you; from all your sins shall ye be clean before the Domina. 31 It is a sabbath of solemn rest unto you, and ye shall afflict your souls; it is a statute for ever. 32 And the priestess, who shall be anointed and who shall be consecrated to be priestess in her mother's stead, shall make the atonement, and shall put on the linen garments, even the holy garments. 33 And she shall make atonement for the most holy place, and she shall make atonement for the tent of meeting and for the altar; and she shall make atonement for the priests and for all the people of the assembly. 34 And this shall be an everlasting statute unto you, to make atonement for the children of Israel because of all their sins once in the year.' And she did as the Domina commanded Moses.
